class.name: ComputeShaderEffect
class.brief_description: Allows using a compute shader to create a custom rendering effect.
class.description: This resource defines a custom rendering effect backed by a [ComputeShaderFile].

method.name: _bind_view
method.description: Called before a view is rendered. Shader parameters that are updated every frame should be set during this callback.

method.name: queue_dispatch
method.description: Queues the specified kernel to be dispatched during the next frame render. By default, kernels are dispatched every frame, so only call this if you have explicitly declared otherwise in your shader using [code][gd::compositor::Skip][/code] or [code][gd::compositor::Once][/code].

members.member: The task associated with this texture.

signal.name: view_dispatching
signal.description: Called right before a view is dispatched. In VR, this will typically be called twice (once for each eye).
